result.eng: Wouldn't you rather go somewhere else?
result.ga: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eile
result.orig: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eile
result.html: Nárbh fhearr leat dul áit éigin eileWouldn't you rather go somewhere else?
result.ponchtml: Nárḃ ḟearr leat dul áit éigin eileWouldn't you rather go somewhere else?

result.eng: They made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
result.ga: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach di
result.orig: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach di
result.html: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach diThey made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad tairiscint dom nárḃ ḟéidir liom eiteaċ diThey made me an offer I couldn't refuse.

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.orig: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.html: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.

result.eng: Although slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ga: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.orig: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach í
result.html: Cé nárbh é an sclábhaíocht an t-aon chúis le cogadh cathartha na Stát Aontaithe ba cheist lárnach íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
result.ponchtml: Cé nárḃ é an scláḃaíoċt an t-aon ċúis le cogaḋ caṫarṫa na Stát Aontaiṫe ba ċeist lárnaċ íAlthough slavery was not the only cause of the United States civil war, it was a central question.
